GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v4.14.292
GSD.description:
net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tstamp_allow_data.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.292 by commit d2c7c751db2a248dbe1f29b1c8a29fa8d65ae28f, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit b245be1f4db1a0394e4b6eb66059814b46670ac3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tstamp_allow_data.
